text: The 2011 Asian Women's Volleyball Championship was held in Taipei, Taiwan from September 15 to September 23, 2011. 14 teams entered for the tournament, Turkmenistan didn't arrive in Taipei in time and lost all matches by forfeit. ==Pools composition== The teams are seeded based on their final ranking at the 2009 Asian Women's Volleyball Championship. {| class="wikitable" width=90%
